description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $5.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Charter Telecom. The average
  contract duration was 3.26 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.5M. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $25.7M.
